name: spectez
title: Spectez
description: This extension helps in inspecting tezos implicit accounts and smart contracts
author: rohanphw

commands.name: searchuser
commands.title: Search User Account
commands.subtitle: tz1...
commands.description: This command is reponsible for inspecting implicit tezos accoounts (tz1...) on mainnet and ghostnet

commands.name: searchcontract
commands.title: Search Contract Address
commands.subtitle: KT1...
commands.description: This command is responsible for inspecting deployed smart contracts on Tezos mainnet and ghostnet
